description: The new chef at this restaurant has an all-encompassing approach that includes fish, meat and vegetables on a classically influenced menu featuring dishes such as snails in butter and “liquid buttons” with Parmesan cheese and cinnamon. The “field and garden” vegetarian dishes include interesting recipes such as roasted broccoli with toasted cashews. The wine list focuses on the estate’s own labels and the Franciacorta region in general.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Great view', 'Interesting wine list', 'Terrace']
